abstract: During the 24 trading days since the July 4 weekend, there were 13 days in which the S.&P. 500 moved at least 1 percent, including five days when it rose or fell more than 2 percent.
lead_paragraph: During the 24 trading days since the July 4 weekend, there were 13 days in which the S.&P. 500 moved at least 1 percent, including five days when it rose or fell more than 2 percent.
